properties.name: application.jobscheduler.enable
properties.description: Disable jobscheduler completely with this set to false. Useful for tests. Default: true

properties.name: application.jobscheduler.initialDelay
properties.description: Initial delay in milliseconds until jobscheduler starts scanning job table and executing jobs. Default: 10000

properties.name: application.jobscheduler.runinterval
properties.description: Interval in milliseconds for scanning job table for next due run. Default: 20000

properties.name: application.jobexecutor.corepoolsize
properties.description: Minimum number of threads kept alive in the thread execution pool. Default: 1

properties.name: application.jobexecutor.maxpoolsize
properties.description: Max number of threads in the thread execution pool. Default: 4

properties.name: application.jobscheduler.sentinel.graceperiod
properties.description: Period in minutes until a sign_of_life is considered old (dead). Default: 15

properties.name: application.jobscheduler.sentinel.update.initial
properties.description: Initial delay in milliseconds until sentinel starts updating sign_of_life. Default: 60000

properties.name: application.jobscheduler.sentinel.update.interval
properties.description: Interval in milliseconds for updating sign_of_life. Default: 20000

properties.name: application.jobscheduler.sentinel.initialDelay
properties.description: Initial delay in milliseconds until sentinel starts checking for hanging jobs. Default: 70000

properties.name: application.jobscheduler.sentinel.runinterval
properties.description: Interval in milliseconds for sentinel to check for hanging Jobs. Default: 900000 (15m)
